THE UNIVERSITY OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK
THE STATE EDUCATION DEPARTMENT
ALBANY 1
Educational Communications
Room 1070
January 12, 1965
Miss Marion ^orwell
Associate Director
Dearborn Public Schools
4824 Lois
Dearborn, Michigan 48126
Dear Miss Corwell:
1 have examined the speakers* guides proposed by NAVA
and DAVI, To prepare a speaker guide for NAEB I would like
to make the following suggestion* I would like to propose
that NAEB publish a short bit of information in a journal
asking for speakers* The idea would be to ask members to
volunteer as speakers or to recommend a speaker and a topic*
In this way we would give all members of NAEB an opportunity
suggest top-notch people and to volunteer their services*
When a recommendation is received, it would be followed up
with a "speakers* information sheet*^ this information would
seek all necessary data as would be supplied in a speaker
guide.
I am going to be in Washington January 17-20 and will
approach Harold Hill with this idea*
May I please have your reactions.
Sincerely yours
Lee E, Campion
Director
LEC/td
cct Harold Hill
